| HistoryText             = Villains Anonymous was a support group created to help super criminals reform their ways.{{r|Spider-Man Unlimited Vol 3 12}}

A Supervillains Anonymous meeting was attended by [[Maxwell Markham (Earth-616)|Grizzly]], [[Frederick Myers (Earth-616)|Boomerang]], [[Consultant (Earth-616)|Hippo]], [[Roger Gocking (Earth-616)|Porcupine]], [[Lester Verde (Earth-616)|Dr. Bong]], [[Norton Fester (Earth-616)|Looter]], [[Desmond Charne (Earth-616)|Mirage]], [[Samuel Saxon (Earth-616)|Machinesmith]],  and others. At another Supervillains Anonymous meeting, Grizzly and Looter talked about their run-ins with Spider-Man.{{r|Superior Foes of Spider-Man #11|12}}
